channel.title: 6thcraft | 99% uptime | griefing / raiding | factions & mcmmo | pvp | [no whitel
channel.description:
Welcome to the 6thCraft Server!
www.6thRangers.com
IP: 108.178.50.3:25579 _____________________________________________________________________ ______________________________________________________________________
6thCraft is a brand new server that was created as part of the =6th= Rangers clan. The server is a PVP Enabled Server with the Factions Plugin. On this server we do allow griefing and raiding.
The server is complete with great staff members who do not have access to creative (excluding when given to them by the two owners to work on spawn) which ensures that they do not have any advantage over the users.
Plugins:
MCMMO
PermissionsEx
Factions
CombatTag
Iconomy
AutoCast
ServerSave
ChestShop
OreObfuscation
Come guys :)
